overview:
Bill joined Ariadne Capital in July 2005 and has the Finance, Operations and Compliance responsibilities.

Bill’s financial experience ranges from chartered accountants, through auditing, to senior management positions. With over 20 years of finance experience.

Prior to joining Ariadne Capital, Bill assisted MediaGold as Group Finance Manager to prepare for its buy out by Avanquest (turnover cÂ£12m). Bill headed the project to consolidate the four UK owned companies. financial systems and procedures into one entity.

Bill also works with Ariadne’s portfolio companies regularly as an interim Financial Director.
